panels.title: Order Processing SLO Budget Remaining

panels.content:
# Order Processing Error Budget Policy

**SLO: 99.9% order processing success rate (monthly)**

**Error Budget: 0.1% = 43.2 minutes of processing failures per month**

## Actions by Consumption Level

### When 50% of the monthly error budget is consumed:
- Investigate database and worker queue performance metrics
- Enhance monitoring of order processing pipeline
- Alert engineering leadership about potential issues

### When 75% of the budget is consumed:
- Deploy only critical order processing-related updates
- Add manual verification step to all deployments
- Increase worker capacity for order processing

### When 100% of the budget is consumed:
- Freeze all changes to order processing system
- Invoke incident response process
- Switch to simplified order processing flow
- Require executive approval to resume normal operations
panels.title: Error Budget Policy

panels.description: Success rate for order processing against 99.9% SLO target
panels.title: Order Processing Success Rate (99.9% Target)

panels.description: Current latency SLO budget consumption (% of 5% budget used)
panels.title: Processing Time Error Budget Consumption

panels.content:
# Order Processing Time Budget Policy

**SLO: 95% of orders processed within 3 seconds**

**Error Budget: 5% of orders can exceed the 3-second threshold**

## Actions by Consumption Level

### When 50% of the latency budget is consumed:
- Analyze performance metrics to identify bottlenecks
- Review recent code changes affecting order processing
- Consider optimizing database queries

### When 75% of the latency budget is consumed:
- Scale up worker resources for order processing
- Implement queue prioritization for orders
- Add performance alerts for critical processing paths

### When 100% of the latency budget is consumed:
- Roll back recent changes affecting processing time
- Implement circuit breakers to prevent cascading failures
- Consider temporary feature reduction to improve core functionality
- Daily status updates to leadership until resolved
panels.title: Processing Time Budget Policy
